description:
JORNY is a pioneering hybrid hospitality brand headquartered in the heart of New York City (NYC) with a global footprint. Our mission is to provide mid-lifers and beyond with an unparalleled opportunity to embark on a transformative journey of connection, exploration, and personal growth. We foster a community where members can connect with like-minded individuals, discover new perspectives, and embrace their unique stage of life.

Position Summary

You will be in charge of sourcing, contacting and securing partnerships. This is a pivotal role at JORNY, as you will be a key player by building and nurturing strategic business relationships.

Responsibilities

Strategic Planning: Collaborate with internal teams to develop strategic plans for partnerships that align with the organization's goals and objectives.

Project Management-: Oversee the implementation of partnership initiatives, ensuring they are executed effectively and efficiently, and provide timely updates or progress reports. Must be able to be autonomous and own the project with little oversight.

Problem Solving: Be nimble and have the ability to think outside of the box and find solutions.

Qualifications:

Proven experience in partnership development and partnership management

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation abilities

Ability to initiate, cultivate and maintain strong relationships that are beneficial to the company’s overall mission.

Previous experience in the hospitality industry is a plus

Familiarity with the mid-lifers and beyond market segment is advantageous.

To apply, please submit your resume and cover letter outlining your relevant experience and why you're excited about joining JORNY.
